title: Imam Mahdi (ajtfs)
text: Peace be upon you, O argument of God over your creation,
peace be upon you, O light of God in His land,
peace be upon you, O trustee of God and Greetings,
peace be upon you, O remnant of his friends and arguments,
peace be upon you and your pure forefathers, peace be upon him.
Peace be upon you and your companions, your supporters, your loved ones, and your companions.
Peace be upon you and upon whom you love.
